title: The March on Washington, D.C.
marks: \"#12\", in pencil, on back; \"Printer/Kelton/BLEAK B \"Danny Lyon\", in pencil, on back
description: two young black men in foreground, wearing white shirts and dark jackets; man at left claps his hands; man at right looking down, with PR arm above his head, snapping his fingers
creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
